welcome_message_body: "Welcome to South Huron, Canada! Get ready to experience the small-town charm and scenic beauty this city is known for. We invite you to explore and savor all that South Huron has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Centralia Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight and cargo shipments at Centralia Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at London International Airport serves smaller regional airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after agreeing to terms and conditions.
